PortraitConfig.title: Portrait: name for players — {name}
PortraitConfig.label: Portrait display name
PortraitConfig.note: This name will be used in player UI and can differ from the actor's real name. Leave the field empty to use the actual name.

gmForcePortraitHeight.name: Override player portrait height
gmForcePortraitHeight.hint: If enabled, the GM can set a specific height for player portraits.

playerCharactersPanelEnabled.name: Enable Player Characters Panel
playerCharactersPanelEnabled.hint: If enabled, a panel for player characters will be displayed.

portraitHeight.name: Portraits: height
portraitHeight.hint: 0 - bottom strip, 1 - full height. Used if GM hasn't forced a value.

portraitBottomOffset.name: Bottom Offset (px)
portraitBottomOffset.hint: How many pixels to lift the portraits above the bottom of the screen. Portrait height is recalculated based on the remaining screen height.

portraitNameVertical.name: Portrait: name badge vertical position
portraitNameVertical.hint: Vertical position of the name badge on the portrait (0 — top, 100 — bottom).

portraitNameFontSize.name: Portrait: name font size
portraitNameFontSize.hint: Font size of the name badge on portraits (in pixels).

portraitNamesAlwaysVisible.name: Portraits: always show names
portraitNamesAlwaysVisible.hint: If enabled, name badges are always visible on portraits (not only on hover).

visualNovelMode.name: Visual novel mode
visualNovelMode.hint: If enabled, portrait will fit the screen from bottom to top.

resizeToFit.name: Portraits: resize to fit all portraits
resizeToFit.hint: If enabled, portraits will be resized to fit within their containers.

adjustForSidebar.name: Portraits: account for sidebar width
adjustForSidebar.hint: If enabled, portrait layout will consider the sidebar width.

portraitToneEnabled.name: Portraits: adjust brightness/contrast based on scene darkness
portraitToneEnabled.hint: If enabled, portrait tones will adjust based on scene darkness.

portraitFlipAccess.name: Who can flip portraits
portraitFlipAccess.hint: Controls who can flip portraits with right-click: only the GM or also players who own the character.

emotionPanelVisibility.name: Emotion Panel Visibility
emotionPanelVisibility.hint: Controls who can see the emotion panel when hovering over a portrait.

resetEmotionOnHide.name: Reset emotion when hiding portrait
resetEmotionOnHide.hint: When enabled, the actor's emotion flag will be cleared when their portrait is hidden.

emotionPanelScale.name: Emotion Panel Scale
emotionPanelScale.hint: Adjusts the overall size of the emotion panel (icon scale).

emotionPanelPosition.name: Emotion Panel Position
emotionPanelPosition.hint: Choose where the emotion panel appears relative to the portrait.

emotionColorIntensity.name: Emotion Color Intensity
emotionColorIntensity.hint: 0 - no color changes from emotions, 1 - full (default)

displayNameSeparators.name: Name: public-part separators
displayNameSeparators.hint: Characters to cut off NPC names for players. Comma-separated. Example: #,: — then "Karl#Main boss" will show players only "Karl".

actorImagePaths.name: Actor image paths (CSV)
actorImagePaths.hint: List of Actor dot-path fields separated by commas, used in order as image source. Example: img, prototypeToken.texture.src, system.image

pcActorTypes.name: Actor Types: Players (CSV)
pcActorTypes.hint: List of Actor types separated by commas to be considered as 'players'. Examples: character, pc, hero, player

npcActorTypes.name: Actor Types: NPCs (CSV)
npcActorTypes.hint: List of Actor types separated by commas to be considered as NPCs. Examples: npc, adversary, creature, monster, minion

portraitFadeMs.name: Portraits: fade-in duration (ms)
portraitFadeMs.hint: Duration in milliseconds for portrait fade-in animation.

portraitMoveMs.name: Portraits: movement duration (ms)
portraitMoveMs.hint: Duration in milliseconds for portrait movement animation.

npcDockFolder.name: NPC Dock: default folder filter
npcDockFolder.hint: Example: 'all'. Can be overridden by the dock during operation.

pcDockFolder.name: Player Dock: folder filter
pcDockFolder.hint: Controls which Actor folder is used for the Player Characters panel in the NPC dock. "All players" shows actors from all folders; "Players without folder" shows only actors that are not in any folder.

showActivePortraits.name: Show Active Portraits Dock
showActivePortraits.hint: When enabled, a mini dock with active portrait circles is shown above the NPC dock.
